lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk rom mihmw AnMq; Agm Apwr gur mihmw inDwn hY [

Unknown.translation: By virtue of inexhaustible toil of Naam Simran in the service of a True Guru, the praise of a hair of a Gursikh is infinite. Then the inaccessible Satguru with countless virtues is a treasure house of praises.

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk bol ko n qol mol; sRI gur sbd Agimiq igAwn iDAwn hY [

Unknown.translation: Those who obey the commands of their True Guru; those who are one with their Guru; their words are beyond evaluation. Then the divine words of a True Guru, his Gyan (knowledge) and reflection on his precepts is beyond comprehension.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: AYsw hI gur is`K dy iek mwqR bol bcn dy qol vIcwr AMdwzy isDwˆq nUM hwrI swrI nhIˆ smJ skdw, Aqy nw hI Es dw mu`l hI mwXw jw skdw hY[ ies dy mukwbly ivc siqgurwˆ dy sbd dw jo igAwn hY, Es dw iDAwn ivc lÎOxw qwˆ hY hI AgMm+ieq = AgMmqw dI AvDI rUp[

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk idRsit idRsit qwrY; sRI gur ktwC ikRpw ko n prmwn hY [

Unknown.translation: When one who is in harmony with True Guru, who meditates on His name, his one glimpse is good enough to sail the recipient across the ocean. Then the intensity of power of a True Guru is incomprehensible.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: guris`K dI idRS†I A`K dI iek mwqR ingHw qwr idMdI hY jd bMdy nUM sMswr qoˆ qwˆ Pyr siqgurwˆ dy ikRpw Bry ktwKÎ A`K dy cuBwau nyqR Br ky q`kn dy pRBwau dw qwˆ koeI prmwx AMdwjw Qhu lwieAw hI nhIˆ jw skdw[

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk pl sMg rMg rs; Aibgq giq siqgur inrbwn hY [73[

Unknown.translation: The company of a person for a second, who is deep into the meditation of Lord's name bless one with happiness, ecstasy and elixir of life. Like indestructible Lord, Satguru  is an epitome of eternal bliss. (73)
